reason: Steps 5-6 CORRECTLY implemented LoadTestJobDefinitions functionality. Job configs (news-crawler.toml and my-custom-crawler.toml) are SUCCESSFULLY loaded at startup and visible in the UI. However, test is SKIPPING due to DOM selector issue in TestEditJobDefinition - the JavaScript query 'button.btn-primary' is not finding edit buttons despite them being visible in the screenshot. This is a TEST CODE bug, NOT an implementation bug.
